alert.note: Alert for Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 2:52AM PDT until March 24 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches in valley floors and 3 to 5 inches at higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph over exposed terrain. * WHERE...Western Siskiyou County, including Highway 96 around Seiad Valley to Somes Bar and Sawyers Bar Road between Etna and Somes Bar. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.
